member.name: E:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.Validation.Integration.AspNet.PropertyProxyValidator.ValueConvert
member.summary: Occurs when value conversion is required by the control to perform validation.
member.remarks: The ValueConvert event is raised when value conversion is required by the control to perform validation. This event is used to provide a custom value conversion routine for an input control, such as a control.
